title: Intensive Short-Term Course to Strengthen Leadership Competencies in ICT-Integrated STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage experience and understanding of secondary education systems
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented environment utilizing VR simulations and smartphone-based tools. Emphasizes social interaction through collaborative and role-playing activities among learners.

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners achieve self-assessed improvement in designing ICT-based STEM education
Develop projects applying three or more ICT-based assessment methods in simulation environments
Reduce technology-related anxiety by 50% or more through collaborative activities and enhance confidence in instructional application

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
